SEARCH
Package com.zoi4erom.animalnetworkbook.businesslogic

Class AnimalService

java.lang.Object
com.zoi4erom.animalnetworkbook.businesslogic.AnimalService
public class AnimalService extends Object
The AnimalService class provides business logic for managing and interacting with animals in a shelter. It includes methods for adding, updating, searching, and deleting animals, as well as validation checks for various fields related to animals.

This class utilizes a JsonConverter for serialization and deserialization of animal data. The data is stored in JSON format, and interactions with shelters are coordinated with the ShelterService.

The class follows a singleton pattern, and instances cannot be created as the constructor is private.

Since:
2024-02-02

  • Method Details

    • addAnimalValidation

      public static List<String> addAnimalValidation(String name, int age, String species, String breed, Shelter shelter)
      Validates the provided information and adds a new animal to the system if validation passes.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the animal.
      age - The age of the animal.
      species - The species of the animal.
      breed - The breed of the animal.
      shelter - The shelter where the animal is located.
      Returns:
      A list of validation errors if any, or an empty list if the animal is added successfully.

    • updateAnimal

      public static Animal updateAnimal(Animal updatedAnimal)

      Parameters:
      updatedAnimal - The updated information for the animal.
      Returns:
      The updated animal object.

    • decrementNumbersOfAnimals

      public static void decrementNumbersOfAnimals(Shelter shelter)

      Parameters:

    • decrementNumbersOfAnimalsInShelter

      Parameters:
      shelter - The shelter from which to decrement the number of animals.
